thread.title: Andrew McCabe Hits Back After Firing, Criticism

author: Aruna Viswanatha
title: Andrew McCabe Hits Back After Firing, Criticism
text:
WASHINGTON—Andrew McCabe’s attorney on Friday stepped up his public defense of the FBI’s former No. 2 official, attacking the process that led to his firing, criticizing former agency director James Comey and threatening legal action against President Donald Trump and others.
The lawyer, Michael Bromwich, told reporters he had evidence contradicting the events outlined in a report from the Justice Department’s inspector general last week, but he hadn’t received permission from the Federal Bureau of Investigation to share it.
...
